[vc_row][vc_column]

PET Preform Moulds

[vc_column_text]WASHUN Machinery offers series of plastic injection molds to turn your plastic product design conception into reality, such as molds for preforms, closure, plastic bottles.

Mega’s preform molds are equipped with advance valve gate system with blanced hot runner design. 20g preform mold reaches 12 sec with 2 stage post cooling robotic system when worked on two stage injection system.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4592″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/8-cavity-preform-mould-for-pco-1810-neck-finish/”]
